post.body:
https://www.infowars.com/facebook-censors-story-about-refugee-raping-swedish-woman/

This is why we need a decentralized platform. Calling it "racist" to report on the gang rape of a woman because of the ethnicity of the perpetrators? And this is just one of many incidents.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/germany-springs-to-action-over-hate-speech-against-migrants/2016/01/06/6031218e-b315-11e5-8abc-d09392edc612_story.html

How about fining and arresting those in Germany who spoke out against the hundred or so assholes who went on a looting and raping spree? In the name of "civility" those speaking out against atrocities were silenced.

It's long overdue that we take back the internet.
